legends.name: Dr. Rajendra Prasad
legends.desc: First President of India, a leader in India's freedom struggle, and known for his humility and statesmanship.

legends.name: Aryabhatta
legends.desc: Legendary mathematician & astronomer, known for Aryabhatiya, and contributions to zero and trigonometry.

legends.name: Shehnai Maestro Bismillah Khan
legends.desc: World-renowned musician who mastered the shehnai and brought Bihar's classical music to the world.

facts.title: Location
facts.desc: Bihar is in Eastern India, with diverse rivers and fertile plains.

facts.title: Agriculture
facts.desc: Rice, wheat, pulses, sugarcane‚ÄîBihar feeds millions.

facts.title: Education
facts.desc: Nalanda and Vikramshila were world-renowned ancient universities.

facts.title: Culture
facts.desc: Chhath Puja, Sonepur Mela, and more show Bihar‚Äôs friendly spirit.

facts.title: History
facts.desc: Home to Buddha, Mahavira, Ashoka‚ÄîBihar shaped world religions.

facts.title: Food
facts.desc: Litti Chokha, Sattu Paratha, Thekua: favorite foods from Bihar.
